#labels Featured,Demo,Video
A collection of video demos and snapshots of the tool in action

= Videos =

* A video demo explaining interaction with the Overlapper is available [http://carpex.usal.es/~visusal/bicoverlapper/videos/overlapper.avi here] (18.8 MB, 1280x1024 resolution).

The [http://carpex.usal.es/~visusal/bicoverlapper/videos/overlapperSubtitled.avi same video with subtitles].

* *NOTE: These videos need [http://carpex.usal.es/~visusal/bicoverlapper/videos/tscc.exe TechSmith codec].* 

* A [http://carpex.usal.es/~visusal/bicoverlapper/videos/bimax.avi video] representing the biggest 25 biclusters from Bimax for a yeast example (9.4 MB, 1280x1024) 

* A [http://carpex.usal.es/~visusal/bicoverlapper/videos/opsm.avi video] representing OPSM biclusters for the same yeast example (13.7 MB, 1280x1024) 

More videos will be available shortly
